version_description:
We haven’t just been popping bottles, we have made quite a few tech updates, check them out now:

* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines and offers for you to choose from
* Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Feedback? We’d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

We felt the last vintage needed some work, your refined palate will appreciate these updates:

* iPhone X support
* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines and offers for you to choose from
* Various bug fixes and improvements

Feedback? We’d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

We felt the last vintage needed some work, your refined palate will appreciate these updates:

* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines and offers for you to choose from
* Various bug fixes and improvements

Feedback? We’d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

We haven’t just been popping bottles, we have made quite a few tech updates, check them out now:

* Fixed an issue with the Friends feed, so no more jumping and lagging
* Vivino Market improvements with more personlized selection of wines and offers for you to choose from
* Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Feedback? We’d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

We haven’t just been popping bottles, we have made quite a few tech updates, check them out now:

* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines and offers for you to choose from
* Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Feedback? We’d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

As does wine, Vivino only improves with age, here are our new updates:

* New search screen to help you find and explore wines
* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines because life is too short to drink bad wine
* For the love of wine, we made bug fixes to improve the app

Feedback? We´d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

This update includes a fix for users who were mistakenly logged out of Vivino. If you were impacted, update in order to restore your information. If you need additional support, email our Customer Experience team at support@vivino.com.

This update includes a fix for users who were mistakenly logged out of Vivino. If you were impacted, update in order to restore your information. If you need additional support, email our Customer Experience team at support@vivino.com.

The new update of Vivino introduces:

* New revamped My Wines and Profile design, giving you a much better overview over all of your wines.

Feedback on the new design? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

We’ve decided to unbottle these new updates:

* New search screen to help you find and explore wines
* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines because life is too short to drink bad wine
* For the love of wine, we made bug fixes to improve the app

Feedback? We´d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

We’ve decided to unbottle these new updates:

* New search screen to help you find and explore wines
* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines because life is too short to drink bad wine
* For the love of wine, we made bug fixes to improve the app

Feedback? We´d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

The new update of Vivino introduces:

* New revamped My Wines and Profile design, giving you a much better overview over all of your wines.

Feedback on the new design? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

This update brings a fix for the problem with the new Profile section being unresponsive on iOS 10 devices.

Feedback? We´d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

Fellow wine lovers, update now and drink on:

* Further Profile improvements with fixes for several issues
* Various bugfixes and improvements

Feedback? We´d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

Fellow wine lovers, update now and drink on:

* Further Profile improvements with fixes for several issues
* Various bugfixes and improvements

Feedback? We´d love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

Dear Vivino users!

Thank you all for your feedback regarding the redesign of the Profile page. We’re listening, and committed to make sure you continue to enjoy your Vivino experience.

With this release, we’ve included a handful of fixes for some quite annoying problems you reported, and we will keep working on making your experience with your wines and friends better.

Please keep the feedback coming - and let us know if you experience any problems or have any questions through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

The new version of Vivino introduces

* Various bug fixes and performance improvements for you to enjoy

Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

The new version of Vivino introduces

* Various bug fixes and performance improvements for you to enjoy

Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

As does wine Vivino only improves with age, here are our new updates:

* New search screen to help you find and explore wines
* Vivino Market improvements with more personalized selection of wines because life is too short to drink bad wine
* For the love of wine, we made bug fixes to improve the app

Feedback? We'd love to hear from you through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

Try out our new upgraded Wine Search!
Want to find a wine with no bottle around? We’ve made 4 great improvements to the way you can search for a wine, and we’d love for you to take it for a spin!

- Easy to find Search, right there in the main menu
- Instant, as-you-type results, using our massively improvement search-engine
- Great overview of the best vintages of the wine you’ve found
- Quick access to search categories, for all those times you know you want something gooood but not quite sure what!

And of course, once you’ve found what you like, go ahead and buy it right there in the Vivino app.

Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

The new version of Vivino introduces

* The fix for the crash on iOS 9 devices

* The new Critics tab in the wine page, which will help you choose the best wine

* The revamped Settings page, making it easier to control the notifications you recieve from Vivino

* Various bug fixes and performance improvements for you to enjoy

Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

The new version of Vivino introduces

* The Wine Taste Characteristics: It’s now easier than ever to know what the wine you want to drink will taste like.
* Vivino Market improvements - Now more personalized and with more wines to buy
* Various bug fixes and improvements

The new update of Vivino introduces:

* The Wine Taste Characteristics: It's now easier than ever to know what the wine you want to drink will taste like.
* Checkout improvements to make your wine buying experience even better
* Various bug fixes and improvements

Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update, we made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.

Share amazing wine with your friends — type the "@" symbol before their usernames in a review or in a comment, and they'll be notified.

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

The latest version of Vivino introduces
* An easy way to look for friends in a search section.
* Various bug fixes
Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

You worry about what wine to try next, we're busy making that experience even better.
No matter the moment - we help you pick the perfect wine. In this version we made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

The latest version of Vivino introduces

* Fix for the issue resulting in some wines disappearing from your Cellar and Wishlist for some users

Feedback? Let us know through our in-app support or on support@vivino.com

* Various bug fixes and improvements

* Various bug fixes

You worry about what wine to try next, we're busy making that experience even better.

No matter the moment - we help you pick the perfect wine. In this version we made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update, we made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.

Discovering the perfect wine just got even easier. We reimagined the search tab to be more powerful and easier to use. Focus your search with new filters including style, food pairings, location, and much more — each designed to help you fine-tune your search for the perfect wine.

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

Discovering the perfect wine just got even easier. We reimagined the search tab to be more powerful and easier to use. Focus your search with new filters including style, food pairings, location, and much more — each designed to help you fine-tune your search for the perfect wine.

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update, we made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.
You'll also find these improvements:

- Taste filter in Search: You can now narrow your search results by the taste characteristics, like sweetness, intensity, and acidity
- Wine Adventures: a new and fun way to learn more about wine, now with two adventures: "Old and New World of Wine" and "Champagne VS Prosecco". Make another scan to dive into your first adventure!

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:

— The new Wine Adventure is here, and this one is all about wine tasting! It's called "Taste wine like a pro", and it can be found in the Adventure Library (Profile -> See all adventures)
— We made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.

We're here to help. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vivino.com or directly through the app under Profile > Settings.

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:

— The new Wine Adventure is here, and this one is all about wine tasting! It's called "Taste wine like a pro", and it can be found in the Adventure Library (Profile -> See all adventures)
— We made performance improvements along with various bug fixes.

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/​support or select "Help and Support" from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings). You can also reach us via chat on desktop at vivino.com (Login to your account and visit your shopping cart for real-time support!).

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:
— Introducing Taste Profile — a better way to find the right wine for you. Easily set your preferences including grape, region, style and more. Quickly see what wines you've liked (or disliked) and we'll help you discover new ones. Try it now by tapping on your photo in the profile section!

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/​support or select "Help and Support" from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings). You can also reach us via chat on desktop at vivino.com (Login to your account and visit your shopping cart for real-time support!).

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:
— Introducing Vivino’s Match For You — a personalized score on every single wine indicating how likely it is the wine you’re looking at is a good match for you. Everyone has different tastes. A 4.5-star wine for you may be a 3.5-star for someone else because it just doesn’t tickle their taste buds in the same way. The more wines you rate and review, the better Match for You works.

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/support or select “Help and Support” from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings). You can also reach us via chat on desktop at vivino.com (Login to your account and visit your shopping cart for real-time support!).

For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:
— Introducing the Vivino Wine Club - We use your Vivino ratings and preferences to pick 6 top-rated wines from around the world and deliver them to you every 6 weeks. Select your price range with shipping included on every club order, skip or cancel anytime, right in the Vivino app. (Only available in the United States).

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/support or select “Help and Support” from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings). You can also reach us via chat on desktop at vivino.com (Login to your account and visit your shopping cart for real-time support!).
